thread.title: Rebels field hockey takes down Lakers to remain unbeaten
thread.title_full: Rebels field hockey takes down Lakers to remain unbeaten - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: Kane O'Neill
title: Rebels field hockey takes down Lakers to remain unbeaten
text: COLCHESTER, Vt. - The South Burlington field hockey team shut out Colchester on the road Monday, 4-0, moving their record to 7-0 on the season. After a scoreless first half, the Rebels scored three goals in four minutes to jump out to a 3-0 lead. Kate Hall picked up a hat trick for South Burlington.
